original_text: After him repaired Nehemiah the son of Azbuk, the ruler of the half part of Bethzur, unto the place over against the sepulchres of David, and to the pool that was made, and unto the house of the mighty.
korean_text: 그 다음은 벧술 지방 절반을 다스리는 아스북의 아들 느헤미야가 중수하여 다윗의 묘실과 마주 대한 곳에 이르고 또 파서 만든 못을 지나 용사의 집까지 이르렀고

sentences.original_text: After him repaired Nehemiah the son of Azbuk
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음에 아스북의 아들 네헤미야가 수리했습니다

sentences.original_text: the ruler of the half part of Bethzur
unto the place over against the sepulchres of David
and to the pool that was made
and unto the house of the mighty
